title: Faryal Makhdoom says she expected a "fairy tale" marriage to Amir Khan but "backward" Bolton marred it
text:
Celebs Faryal Makhdoom says she expected a "fairy tale" marriage to Amir Khan but "backward" Bolton marred it The boxer's wife said living in Bolton was hard and she didn't have any friends - but now she says the UK is home for her and she doesn't want to return to the US Share Amir and Faryal have been married since 2013 (Photo: PA) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
The wife of boxer Amir Khan has told how she thought her marriage to the hero would be a ‘fairy tale’ - but it has been marred by spats with his family. 
The clashes have seen American Faryal Makhdoom fall out with Khan’s family. 
She said: “In my head, living with my new husband was going to be this fairy tale, but it was hard and I didn’t have any friends. 
“Bolton is very backward. Compared to New York, it’s a village.” 
The 25-year-old also admitted having cosmetic procedures on her cheeks and eyes . 
Faryal Makhdoom , 25, had the procedures under the guidance of Simon Ourian, who is Kim Kardashian’s doctor. 
“Because of lack of sleep, genes, dehydration, I get bags under my eyes and I wanted to get them lightened” said Faryal. 
She has also had fillers in her cheeks. “I like high cheekbones” she said. Read More Faryal Makhdoom admits visiting Kim K's surgeon and wanting ANOTHER baby with Amir Khan - despite toxic family drama Faryal has admitted having fillers (Photo: Snapchat/FaryalMakhdoom) 
During a public fall out with the boxer’s family last year, she revealed Amir’s brother Harroon had accused her of having plastic surgery and looking like Michael Jackson. 
She hit back today saying: “I’ve never had plastic surgery. Fillers and plastic surgery are two different things and I want people to understand that. 
“If other women had this money and if they had a husband who was famous, they would do it, too. 
“If I wasn’t married to Amir Khan, I’d probably be a regular girl and I might not do it. But I’m in the limelight, I go to events, so it’s part of my life now.” Read More Faryal has fallen out with Amir's family (Photo: PA) The couple are apparently planning more children (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
She and Amir, 30, married in 2013 and their daughter Lamaisah arrived a year later. 
The couple are currently living in San Francisco as Amir trains for a fight later this year. 
But Faryal, an American, says they will return to live in the UK and are planning more children. 
“My husband wants another child so badly” she said. 
And she added: “I love the UK, it’s home for me now. 
“After Trump became president, my heart kind of drifted away from America. I’m so glad I don’t live in the US permanently. The amount of love I get in the UK is amazing.” Like us on Facebook
